DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational study designed to help researchers understand the genetics and pathogenesis of type 1 diabetes, and to identify biomarkers for disease and disease complication prediction.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Assessment in Newborns for Diabetes Autoimmunity
DOC.detailed_description: This study is designed to identify people who are at risk for developing type 1 diabetes, based on their genetics, family history and autoimmunity status, and to understand the role genetics plays in the development of the complications associated with type 1 diabetes in patients already affected by type 1 diabetes.
